items.title: Nestle India considering price hikes to counter commodity inflation
items.description: Nestle India, the Indian arm of the eponymous Swiss consumer goods giant, reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly profit, hit by a slowdown in consumer spending in major cities and higher product prices

items.title: Nuclear Power: How NTPC may steal a march over its competitors
items.description: NTPC is currently in talks with six-seven states for land to build nuclear power plants. The PSU will build both small and conventional reactors.

items.title: Apple, under threat from Trump tariffs, will add 20,000 US jobs
items.description: Apple will also expand data center capacity in Arizona, Oregon, Iowa, Nevada and North Carolina, all states with existing Apple capacity

items.title: Baba Kalyani's Bharat Forge to join hands with AMD for Made in India servers
items.description: The electronics division of Kalyani Powertrain announced the plans on February 24, calling it a major milestone for India's server infrastructure, and plans to integrate AMD's technology with domestically manufactured solutions.

items.title: Insolvency against Coffee Day resumes as NCLAT fails to pass order within deadline
items.description: Last week, the Chennai bench of the National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) completed the hearing and reserved its order over the appeal filed by the director of its suspended board, CDEL informed through a regulatory filing

items.title: Adani Power receives LoI to acquire Vidarbha Industries Power; stock down 1%
items.description: The Committee of Creditors of VIPL approved the resolution plan submitted by Adani Power, the statement said

items.title: Federal Bank: The journey is getting bigger, more profitable
items.description: Federal Bank has unveiled a transformation journey to leap to the top league of private sector banks

items.title: Tata Technologies sees modest growth, faces challenges in automotive space
items.description: Both automotive and education sectors reported a soft performance in Q3FY25

items.title: US Congresswoman cites 'supply chain disturbances' to move PILLS Act for production of generic medicines
items.description: The PILLS Act, or Producing Incentives for Long-term Production of Lifesaving Supply of Medicines Act, offers pharma companies tax incentives to shift 'all aspects of the manufacturing process' for generic medicines, including materials and testing, to the United States.

items.title: Manappuram Finance gains 2% on report saying Bain Capital nears deal to acquire controlling stake
items.description: The deal comes soon after the Reserve Bank of India lifted curbs on the non-bank lender’s subsidiary Asirwad Micro Finance a month ago, the report said.

items.title: Pfizer shares rise by 7% after marketing and sale pact with Mylan for two neuro therapy brands
items.description: The marketing and supply agreement is for a period of five years for India only, to enhance distribution and in clinic presence of the two products.
